mapper.select: SELECT A.prd_id ,A.prd_no , B.cate_name , C.sub_cate_name, A.prd_moq, A.prd_qty, A.prd_spec, A.prd_desc , A.prd_tol, A.prd_temp, A.prd_type, A.prd_maker , A.update_date FROM prd_product_manage A LEFT JOIN prd_part_category B ON A.cate_id = B.cate_id LEFT JOIN prd_part_sub_category C ON A.sub_cate_id = C.sub_cate_id ORDER BY prd_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM prd_product_manage A left join prd_part_category B ON A.cate_id = B.cate_id left join prd_part_sub_category C ON A.sub_cate_id = C.sub_cate_id where A.prd_no = #{prdNo}
SELECT * FROM prd_product_manage A left join prd_part_category B ON A.cate_id = B.cate_id left join prd_part_sub_category C ON A.sub_cate_id = C.sub_cate_id where A.prd_id = #{prdId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prd_product_manage (cate_id,sub_cate_id, prd_no , prd_desc, prd_spec , prd_tol, prd_temp , prd_type , prd_qty, prd_moq, prd_maker) VALUES (#{cateId}, #{subCateId}, #{prdNo}, #{prdDesc}, #{prdSpec}, #{prdTol}, #{prdTemp}, #{prdType}, #{prdQty}, #{prdMoq}, #{prdMaker})
mapper.update: UPDATE prd_product_manage SET cate_id = #{cateId}, sub_cate_id = #{subCateId}, prd_no = #{prdNo}, prd_desc = #{prdDesc}, prd_spec = #{prdSpec}, prd_tol = #{prdTol}, prd_temp = #{prdTemp}, prd_type = #{prdType}, prd_qty = #{prdQty}, prd_moq = #{prdMoq}, prd_maker = #{prdMaker} WHERE prd_id = #{prdId}
